analysis:
Entries in Art and design subjects have decreased a little across the UK over the last four years. The -2.8% change compared to a change of -0.7% in all A-Level entries over the last four years.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in Art and design subjects in 2017 compared to all A-Level subjects. A total of 27.5% of pupils achieved A*-A grades in Art and design subjects compared to 2014% for all subjects.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in Biology in 2017 compared to all A-Level subjects. A total of 26.2% of pupils achieved A*-A grades in Biology compared to 2014% for all subjects.
